table_description: GitHub Commits bundle project files for download by users.

columns.name: author
columns.description: Name of the author of the commit.

columns.name: comment_count
columns.description: Number of comments on the commit.

columns.name: html_url
columns.description: URL of the commit on the repository.

columns.name: is_verified
columns.description: Indicates if the commit is verified.

columns.name: changes
columns.description: Details of the changes made in the commit.

columns.name: files
columns.description: List of files changed in the commit.

columns.name: pull_requests
columns.description: List of associated pull request IDs.

columns.name: target
columns.description: Target details of the commit (e.g., branch, organization, repository).
